mapper.insert:
select request_seq.nextval from dual
insert into request(r_no,j_mno,r_field,r_subject,r_lesson_purpose, r_your_level,r_item_exists,r_lesson_type,r_want_date,r_want_time,r_age, r_gender,r_dalin_is_ok,r_wannable,r_want_area,r_write_date, d_mno,rb_enabled,r_is_read) values(#{rNo},#{jMno},#{rField},#{rSubject},#{rLessonPurpose}, #{rYourLevel},#{rItemExists},#{rLessonType},#{rWantDate},#{rWantTime}, #{rAge},#{rGender},0,#{rWannable},#{rWantArea},sysdate,#{dMno},1,0)
mapper.select: select r_no rNo, j_mno jMno, r_field rField, r_subject rSubject, r_lesson_purpose rLessonPurpose, r_your_level rYourLevel, r_item_exists rItemExists, r_lesson_type rLessonType, r_want_date rWantDate, r_want_time rWantTime, r_age rAge, r_gender rGender, r_dalin_is_ok rDalinIsOk, r_wannable rWannable, r_want_area rWantArea, r_write_date rWriteDate, d_mno dMno, rb_enabled rbEnabled,r_is_read rIsRead from request where r_no=#{rNo} and rownum=1

select * from (select r.* ,rownum rnum from (select r_no rNo, j_mno jMno, r_field rField, r_subject rSubject, r_lesson_purpose rlessonPurpose, R_YOUR_LEVEL rYourLevel, R_ITEM_EXISTS rItemExists, r_lesson_type rLessonType, r_want_time rWantTime, r_age rAge, r_gender rGender, r_dalin_is_ok rDalinIsOk, r_wannable rWannable, r_want_area rWantArea, r_write_date rWriteDate, d_mno dMno, rb_enabled rbEnabled from request where j_mno = #{jMno}) r where rownum<=#{endRowNum}) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}

select * from (select r.* ,rownum rnum from (select r_no rNo,j_mno jMno, r_subject rSubject, r_field rField, r_dalin_is_ok rDalinIsOk, r_want_area rWantArea, r_write_date rWriteDate, d_mno dMno, rb_enabled rbEnabled,r_is_read rIsRead from request where d_mno = #{dMno}) r where rownum<=#{endRowNum}) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}
mapper.delete: delete from request where r_no=#{rNo} and rownum=1
mapper.select: select count(*) from request where j_mno = #{jMno}
select count(*) from request where d_mno = #{dMno}
select count(*) from request where e_is_read = and d_Mno = #{dMno} and rownum=1
mapper.update: update request set r_is_read = 1 where r_no = #{rNo} and rownum=1
